description: Try our easy to follow Herb-roasted New Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Herb-roasted New Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 cloves garlic, peeled but left whole

recipeInstructions.text: Put the oil into a roasting tin and place in a preheated oven, 200°C for 5 minutes until hot.
Add the potatoes, garlic cloves and herb sprigs, season well with sea salt and pepper and turn to coat in the oil.
Return to the oven and roast for 40-45 minutes, turning occasionally, until the potatoes are crisp and tender. Serve hot.
